summary: Screenshots of Battle Hardened Warpaints, XCE Morrowind warpaints, and hi-res vanilla replacers
descriptionHtml: After spending a few hours trying to find a guide to what Battle Hardened Warpaints replaced which vanilla ones, I decided to just sit down and put one together myself. Each of these files has male and female reference shots of each warpaint, renamed to match that paint's file. Included are [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34539/?]Diethardt's Battle Hardened Warpaints[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21081/?]Xenius' Morrowind Warpaints[/url], and [http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29977/?]Xenius' hi-res Warpaint and Dirt[/url]. All credit goes to the mod authors; I just took the screenshots.
author: LadyVagabond
